item.title: My Personal Data Science Roadmap
item.description: My pathway in learning Data Science note that : 1st phase => earlier, beginner stage, all task completed 2nd phase => current stage, many incomplete task 3rd phase => future path, things to learn in future 1st phase Courses Data Science using R career tracks on DataCamp R programming dplyr library tidyverse library ggplot used my knowledge to complete one of my Probability and Statistic’s assignment DataCamp’s courses Shell Introduction to SQL Data Science using Python career tracks on DataCamp Python programming functions More complete data science skills Importing data using Pandas Data Cleaning Data Wrangling EDA Data Visualization using pandas, matplotlib, seaborn, missingno Interactive Data Viz using Bokeh Statistical thinking Time-series Supervised & unsupervised tree based model like DT, RF … linear models like lr, logreg web scraping cluser analysis OOP Geospatial data Projects Titanic Loan prediction Big mart sales Outcome Python R Basics of SQL Basics data science skills using Python Data Visualization 2nd phase Courses Version control
